queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-apiserver}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-apiserver}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-kuberay-default-operator.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=release-name-kuberay-default-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-kuberay-default-operator.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=release-name-kuberay-default-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-apiserver}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-apiserver}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-operator}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kuberay-operator}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kuberay-apiserver}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kuberay-apiserver}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kuberay-operator}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kuberay-operator}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-apiserver}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kuberay-operator}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
